data.title: Zürich, Switzerland
data.meta_description: February weather for Zürich, Switzerland: The month with the most snowfall in Zürich, Switzerland, is February, when snow falls for 5.2 days and typically aggregates up to 220mm (8.66") of snow. In Zürich, Switzerland, in February, during 9.3 rainfall days, 64mm (2.52") of precipitation is typically accumulated.
data.text:
Average high temperature in February: 4.6°C

The warmest month (with the highest average high temperature) is July (24°C).

The month with the lowest average high temperature is January (2.9°C).

Average low temperature in February: -1.6°C

The month with the highest average low temperature is July (14°C).

The coldest month (with the lowest average low temperature) is January (-2°C).

Average snowfall in February

Zürich, Switzerland

Average snowfall in February: 220mm

The month with the highest snowfall is February (220mm).

The months with the least snowfall are May, June, July, August and September (0mm).

Average snowfall days in February

Zürich, Switzerland

Average snowfall days in February: 5.2 days

The month with the highest number of snowfall days is February (5.2 days).

The months with the least snowfall days are May, June, July, August and September (0 days).

Average daylight in February /

Average sunshine in February

Zürich, Switzerland

Average daylight in February: 10h and 2min

The month with the longest days is June (Average daylight: 15h and 54min).

The month with the shortest days is December (Average daylight: 8h and 30min).

Average sunshine in February: 2h and 5min

The month with the most sunshine is July (Average sunshine: 6h and 54min).

The month with the least sunshine is December (Average sunshine: 1h and 24min).

Average UV index in February

Zürich, Switzerland

Average UV index in February: 2

The months with the highest UV index are June and July (UV index 8).

The months with the lowest UV index are January, November and December (UV index 1).
